subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won her third straight World Cup downhill Friday in Haus im Ennstal, Austria, and regained the lead in the overall standings from Maria Riesch of Germany.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn won her third straight World Cup downhill Friday in Haus im Ennstal, Austria, and regained the lead in the overall standings from Maria Riesch of Germany.
